description.displayText:
This was the first time I used an agency/website service, and I thought they were great. Jaslin was very prompt, and amazing. My son who is shy fell in love with her instantly. Jaslin put my worries at ease and made me feel comfortable with using her as a caregiver. 
So it is much pleasure that I'm able to recommend Jaslin as a babysitter/care giver. She has watched my son Mon-Friday every morning before she would drop him at the bus stop. She consistently arrived at our home on time, ready to attend to my son with a smile.
description.originalText:
This was the first time I used an agency/website service, and I thought they were great. Jaslin was very prompt, and amazing. My son who is shy fell in love with her instantly. Jaslin put my worries at ease and made me feel comfortable with using her as a caregiver. 
So it is much pleasure that I'm able to recommend Jaslin as a babysitter/care giver. She has watched my son Mon-Friday every morning before she would drop him at the bus stop. She consistently arrived at our home on time, ready to attend to my son with a smile.
